amendment.description: Amendment requires the Inspector Generals of DOD and DOE, in consultation with the FBI and CIA, to conduct an annual audit of policies related to the export of technologies and transfer of scientific information to China and to submit the audit to Congress.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 6 and printed in part A of H. Rept. 106-175 to require the Inspector Generals of DOD and DOE, in consultation with the FBI and CIA, to conduct an annual audit of policies related to the export of technologies and transfer of scientific information to China.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sweeney amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
